AE.name: Super Mario™ 3D Land
AE.description: Platforming with serious depth! With the 3D visuals of Super Mario 3D Land, players can see exactly where floating blocks and flying Paragoombas are, so that they can jump and stomp with the precision of the pros. Expert gamers will appreciate the way 3D graphics reveal the true challenge of the levels, so that they can focus on nailing the perfect jump or shaving precious seconds off their speed runs, while new players will find that 3D makes platforming simple to grasp and satisfying to master. Try on Mario's Tanooki Suit, and put some spring in your step! While longtime gamers will delight in using Tanooki Mario's tail-spin attack to sweep enemies off their feet and fluttering through the air to land super-long jumps, a new generation will learn what makes this classic suit a fan favorite. But even seasoned players will be in for a surprise—Mario's enemies may be sporting the familiar Tanooki tail too! Mario at his very best! Mario™ returns to his roots in his first 3D platforming adventure designed exclusively for a handheld system. From the frantic race-against-the-clock dash through the Mushroom Kingdom to that final leap to grab the top of the flagpole, this eye-popping addition to the Super Mario™ series combines everything that makes Mario great from one generation to the next.

BR.name: Super Mario™ 3D Land
BR.description: Agora as plataformas têm mais profundeza! Com os novos visuais em 3D do Super Mario 3D Land, os jogadores poderão ver onde estão os blocos e Paragoombas flutuantes para conseguir pular no que precisar com muita precisão. Os jogadores avançados vão gostar do jeito que as imagens 3D revelam o verdadeiro desafio das fases, para assim concentrar no pulo perfeito e correr efetivamente contra o tempo. Os jogadores mais novatos vão achar fácil a maneira de dominar este mundo em 3D. Use o traje Tanooki do Mario, e desafie a gravidade. Sinta a nostalgia de usar o ataque rodopiante do Tanooki para atacar inimigos, pular mais alto e voar, ou descubra pela primeira vez as vantagens deste traje clássico que é um favorito dos fãs. E temos até uma surpresa aos fãs fanáticos – agora os inimigos do Mario também podem ter o rabinho do Tanooki! Um jogo exclusivo do Mario. A aventura de plataformas do Mario está de volta, e pela primeira vem em 3D e feito para um console portátil. Corra contra o tempo pelo Mushroom Kingdom, e consiga aquela bandeirinha do final da fase; esta nova adição à série Super Mario™ combina todos os melhores elementos de todas as gerações do Mario.

Mario™ returns to his roots in his first 3D platforming adventure designed exclusively for a handheld system. From the frantic race-against-the-clock dash through the Mushroom Kingdom to that final leap to grab the top of the flagpole, this eye-popping addition to the Super Mario™ series combines everything that makes Mario great from one generation to the next.

JM.name: Super Mario™ 3D Land
JM.description: Platforming with serious depth! With the 3D visuals of Super Mario 3D Land, players can see exactly where floating blocks and flying Paragoombas are, so that they can jump and stomp with the precision of the pros. Expert gamers will appreciate the way 3D graphics reveal the true challenge of the levels, so that they can focus on nailing the perfect jump or shaving precious seconds off their speed runs, while new players will find that 3D makes platforming simple to grasp and satisfying to master. Try on Mario's Tanooki Suit, and put some spring in your step! Mario™ returns to his roots in his first 3D platforming adventure designed exclusively for a handheld system. From the frantic race-against-the-clock dash through the Mushroom Kingdom to that final leap to grab the top of the flagpole, this eye-popping addition to the Super Mario™ series combines everything that makes Mario great from one generation to the next.

MX.name: Super Mario™ 3D Land
MX.description: ¡Un juego de plataformas con bastante profundidad! Gracias a la presentación visual en 3D de Super Mario 3D Land, los jugadores pueden ver exactamente en dónde están los bloques y los Paragoombas voladores, permitiéndoles así saltar y aplastar con la precisión de todo un experto. Los jugadores expertos podrán apreciar la forma en que las imágenes 3D ponen en claro el desafío de cada nivel, y enfocarse así en realizar ese salto perfecto o disminuir el tiempo necesario para completar un nivel contrarreloj; mientras que los jugadores principiantes encontrarán que el efecto 3D facilita el juego con plataformas. Prueba el traje Tanuki de Mario, ¡y entra en acción! Mientras los jugadores que han jugado la serie por años gozarán poder volver a usar el coletazo de Tanuki Mario para vencer a enemigos y hacer saltos superlargos, una nueva generación conocerá por qué este traje clásico es un favorito de los aficionados. ¡Pero hasta los jugadores más expertos se sorprenderán al ver que los enemigos de Mario también podrán usar la famosa cola Tanuki! ¡Mario está en su mejor momento! Mario™ regresa a sus orígenes en su primera aventura de plataformas en 3D diseñada exclusivamente para una consola portátil. Desde la frenética carrera contrarreloj a través del Reino Champiñón, hasta el último salto para alcanzar la parte más alta del asta, esta nueva entrega de la serie Super Mario™ brinda la acción clásica de Mario a una nueva generación de diversión.
